channel.title: Comments on: Migrating old site

item.title: By: David Nash
item.dc:creator: David Nash
item.description: Fantastic, thank you Peter! The animated gif is back (http://homepages.uc.edu/~nashdb/cincinnati/lexington_peneplain.htm)!
item.content:encoded: Fantastic, thank you Peter! The animated gif is back (http://homepages.uc.edu/~nashdb/cincinnati/lexington_peneplain.htm)!

item.title: By: Peter
item.dc:creator: Peter
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/blog/2018/04/05/migrating-old-site/#comment-15115">David Nash</a>.
Ah, David. That's awesome! Thanks for your continued support. The original gif is available at `/ccam88x31/` now.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to David Nash.

Ah, David. That’s awesome! Thanks for your continued support. The original gif is available at `/ccam88x31/` now.

item.title: By: David Nash
item.dc:creator: David Nash
item.description: Hi Peter, My ConquerCam site is still working fine going on for two decades now! I have had a ‚Äúshoutout‚Äù for ConquerCam on the same webpage for many years linked to an animated gif on your site, /ConquerCam/images/ccam88x31.gif, but it no longer appears to be there, presumably cleaned out when you migrated to your new site. Did you relocate it or is there another gif I could use available elsewhere? All the best, David
item.content:encoded:
Hi Peter,
My ConquerCam site is still working fine going on for two decades now! I have had a ‚Äúshoutout‚Äù for ConquerCam on the same webpage for many years linked to an animated gif on your site, /ConquerCam/images/ccam88x31.gif, but it no longer appears to be there, presumably cleaned out when you migrated to your new site. Did you relocate it or is there another gif I could use available elsewhere?
All the best,
David

item.content:encoded: Hold da op JA det er et helt nyt Look . Kunne nu godt lide den gamle side, hvor man kunne l√¶se lidt om alt hvad du har lavet, men det kan man m√•ske ogs√• nu. M√• nok lige s√¶tte mig ind i det. -:)
